title: Lyndon B Johnson National Historical Park: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating and Sleeping          Â   There is no lodging or camping in the park. Two motels, several bed and breakfast facilities, and two RV facilities are available in Johnson City. Many motels, bed and breakfast inns and RV camping opportunities are in Fredericksburg, 32 miles west of the visitor center and 18 miles west of the LBJ Ranch. Contact Texas Parks and Wildlife Department for other camping locations in the immediate area or call 1-800-792-1112.
